# ORDER PICTURES (Junction Table)
# Links orders with pictures and their selected sizes/quantities

This is the junction table that connects:
- orders (which customer ordered)
- pictures (which picture was ordered)
- picture_sizes (what size they selected)
- pic_qty (how many copies)

STRUCTURE:
- order_picture_id: Auto-increment primary key
- order_id: Foreign key to orders table
- pic_id: Foreign key to pictures table
- pic_size_id: Foreign key to picture_sizes table
- pic_qty: Number of copies ordered

==================
ORDER 1 (Customer: john.doe@mail.com, Date: 2025-10-27)
==================
1. Picture E1P1 (pic_id: 1) - Small (£5.00) - Qty: 2 - Total: £10.00
2. Picture E2P1 (pic_id: 5) - Large (£15.00) - Qty: 2 - Total: £30.00
Order 1 Total: £40.00

==================
ORDER 2 (Customer: john.doe@mail.com, Date: 2025-10-07)
==================
1. Picture E4P7 (pic_id: 15) - Extra Large (£20.00) - Qty: 5 - Total: £100.00
2. Picture E2P5 (pic_id: 9) - Extra Large (£20.00) - Qty: 10 - Total: £200.00
Order 2 Total: £300.00

==================
ORDER 3 (Customer: john.doe@mail.com, Date: 2025-11-10)
==================
1. Picture E4P8 (pic_id: 16) - Large (£15.00) - Qty: 1 - Total: £15.00
2. Picture E2P1 (pic_id: 5) - Large (£15.00) - Qty: 2 - Total: £30.00
3. Picture E2P3 (pic_id: 7) - Small (£5.00) - Qty: 10 - Total: £50.00
Order 3 Total: £95.00

==================

==================
1. Picture E5P4 (pic_id: 20) - 8x10 (£18.00) - Qty: 10 - Total: £180.00
Order 4 Total: £180.00

==================
ORDER 5 (Customer: john.doe@mail.com, Date: 2025-08-27)
==================
NOTE: Bulk order
1. Picture E4P7 (pic_id: 15) - 4x6 (£8.00) - Qty: 5 - Total: £40.00
2. Picture E4P5 (pic_id: 13) - 5x7 (£12.00) - Qty: 1 - Total: £12.00
3. Picture E2P3 (pic_id: 7) - Small (£5.00) - Qty: 10 - Total: £50.00
Order 5 Total: £102.00

==================

Order 8 Total: £120.00

==================
ORDER 9 (Customer: john.doe@mail.com, Date: 2025-10-12)
==================
1. Picture E1P3 (pic_id: 3) - Medium (£10.00) - Qty: 4 - Total: £40.00
2. Picture E3P2 (pic_id: 10) - 4x6 (£8.00) - Qty: 2 - Total: £16.00
Order 9 Total: £56.00

==================
SUMMARY
==================
Total Orders: 9
Total Order Items: 16 (some orders have multiple pictures)
Most Ordered Picture: E2P3 (pic_id: 7) - ordered in 2 different orders
Largest Order: Order 2 (£300.00)
Smallest Order: Order 7 (£30.00)

PRICE SIZE REFERENCE:
1 = Small (£5.00)
2 = Medium (£10.00)
3 = Large (£15.00)
4 = Extra Large (£20.00)
5 = 4x6 (£8.00)
6 = 5x7 (£12.00)
7 = 8x10 (£18.00)
